item.title: Remapping Linux Modifiers with XKB
item.description: tl;dr I remapped my keys using xkb resulting in Caps Lock being Super and the left Windows key being meta. This allowed me to use Gnone global navigation shortcuts while still using MacOS bindings in my JetBrains IDEs. Xkb can be really difficult to work with, so hopefully for anyone else hoping to accomplish a similar goal will be able to use some of the information here to save some time.
